alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Central; Baldwin Coastal; Baldwin Inland; Mobile Central; Mobile Coastal; Mobile Inland (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 24 at 2:48PM CST until January 25 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...In Alabama, Mobile Inland, Baldwin Inland, Mobile Central, Baldwin Central, Mobile Coastal and Baldwin Coastal Counties. In Mississippi, Stone and George Counties. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 9 AM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Fog will be particularly dense along coastal areas in and around Mobile Bay where visibilities may be reduced to one tenth of a mile or less at times.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Baldwin Central; Baldwin Coastal; Baldwin Inland; Mobile Central; Mobile Coastal; Mobile Inland
